meanings.definition: Using a fictitious name or pen name.
meanings.sent1: The mysterious author chose to remain pseudonymous to keep their real identity hidden.
meanings.sent2: The book was written by a pseudonymous writer known only by their pen name.
meanings.sent3: It was quite amusing to discover that the famous author was actually pseudonymous all along.
meanings.sent4: The pseudonymous artist painted a world where reality and fantasy intertwined seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: The pseudonymous identity added an air of intrigue to the online forum.

meanings.definition: Written or published under a pseudonym.
meanings.sent1: The pseudonymous poet's work captivated readers with its emotional depth.
meanings.sent2: Many classic novels were originally published under pseudonymous names.
meanings.sent3: The pseudonymous blogger shared hilarious stories under a secret identity.
meanings.sent4: Her pseudonymous persona allowed her to explore different writing styles freely.
meanings.sent5: The pseudonymous author's true talent shone through in every line of the novel.
